TITLE: Episode 32 - The Stop Wars Holiday Special
DESCRIPTION: Merry Christmas! This week, we have an MLGA Network collaboration Christmas show. We have Maddie from Voluntary Vixens, Kim from Lesbertarian, Thaddeus from Thank You For Your Servers, David from The Morning Drive With David, Ryan from Techno-Agorist, and, as always, your least favorite podcaster, me.
